Yujun

Korean: 유준

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Lee Yu Jun
Native name:
이유준
Birthday:
Jan 4, 2007
Age:
18 years old

Introduction

Yujun is a South Korean singer under Future Idol Asia. He is a member of the project boy group Villain.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024.
